this_title: BBC Proms: Last Night of the Proms
trans_title: BBC逍遥音乐节2018年终场之夜
introduction: Sir Andrew Davis, the much-loved former Chief Conductor of the BBC Symphony Orchestra and a veteran steersman of the Last Night, returns to direct the greatest annual party in classical music.The popular nautical theme of traditional favourites by Henry Wood and Thomas Arne is extended in Stanford’s Songs of the Sea, featuring star Canadian baritone Gerald Finley.Another Brit...

foreign_title: BBC Proms: Last Night of the Proms
